name: Google Books - Darker
description: A dark theme specifically for Google Books online. While some other themes still function, a number of class names have changed or been removed. This theme attempts to create a more uniform, if monotone, color scheme that is much easier on the eyes when reading at night or in a dark room. @mikedpad on GitHub
additional_info: Revisions can be tracked via the Gist on my GitHub profile. v0.1 - Initial release based on some of the other dated offerings. v0.2 - Colors not clashing nearly as much with a simplified color scheme. - Rounded corners on popup elements. - Sidebar menu popup has an updated, easier to read style.
